text: Giscard d'Estaing is a French surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Anne-Aymone Giscard d'Estaing (born 1933), former First Lady of France *Aurore Giscard d'Estaing, illustrator and wife of Timothy Hutton *Guillaume Giscard d'Estaing (born 1958), French businessman *Henri Giscard d'Estaing (born 1956), French businessman *Louis Giscard d'Estaing (born 1958), French politician *Olivier Giscard d'Estaing (born 1927), French politician *Valéry Giscard d'Estaing (1926–2020), former President of France
title: Giscard d'Estaing (surname)
